Name: Globus Baumarkt
Company description: Globus Baumarkt is a leading retail chain in Germany and Luxembourg, specializing in home improvement and gardening supplies. The company offers a comprehensive range of products, including building materials, tools, and garden equipment, catering to the diverse needs of its clientele. With approximately 90 stores and a dedicated workforce of around 9,000 employees, Globus Baumarkt aims to provide an exceptional shopping experience for both DIY enthusiasts and professional tradespeople. The company's mission is to deliver high-quality products at competitive prices while ensuring excellent customer service and expert advice. Globus Baumarkt serves a diverse customer base that includes homeowners, contractors, and gardening aficionados, making it a go-to destination for a wide array of home improvement needs. The company actively engages in training and development, with around 700 apprentices enrolled in various programs, reflecting its commitment to fostering talent within the retail sector. By collaborating with various suppliers and partners, Globus Baumarkt maintains a diverse product range, ensuring customers have access to the latest tools, materials, and gardening supplies. A standout product offering is the Power XChange battery system from Einhell, which promotes flexibility and organization by allowing universal use across all devices in the product family. Globus Baumarkt is also dedicated to sustainability and community engagement, striving to provide innovative solutions that are both cost-effective and environmentally friendly. Through its strong focus on customer service and partnerships with renowned manufacturers, Globus Baumarkt aims to be the first choice for all DIY and construction projects, empowering customers with the knowledge and resources they need to succeed in their endeavors.

Name: OBI Bau- Und Heimwerkermärkte Systemzentrale GmbH
Company description: OBI Bau- und Heimwerkermärkte Systemzentrale GmbH is a leading DIY retailer operating across ten European countries, including Germany, Austria, and Poland. The company is dedicated to empowering customers to create their ideal living spaces by providing a wide range of home improvement products and expert advice. With a workforce of approximately 40,000 employees, OBI emphasizes a strong commitment to employee development and sustainability, aligning with its mission to enhance customer experiences while promoting responsible practices. The company collaborates with various partners, including franchisees, to expand its market presence and continuously innovate its offerings. OBI's vision is to be the preferred partner for all home-related projects, ensuring that customers feel supported and inspired in their DIY endeavors.

Name: Hornbach Holding AG & Co. KGaA
Company description: HORNBACH Holding is an independent, family-run European home improvement company which is listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange and part of the SDAX. It’s largest and most important subsidiary is HORNBACH Baumarkt AG, which operates DIY megastores and online shops in 9 European countries. The Group also includes HORNBACH Baustoff Union, a regional builders’ merchant business, as well as HORNBACH Immobilien AG which develops retail real estate for the Group.   HORNBACH caters for customers who pursue their own DIY projects or run a commercial builders’ business. For our clients, we offer a broad and deep product range, meeting high standards of quality, reliability, and accessibility. We are proud to be known for our excellent project-related services in store and online.   Through this profile, we aim to provide interesting and exciting insights into our company and show why we are one of the leading home improvement companies and stocks in Europe.

Name: QVC Germany
Company description: QVC Germany is a prominent home shopping network that specializes in multimedia retailing, offering a wide array of products across categories such as fashion, beauty, home goods, and technology. The company is dedicated to providing an engaging shopping experience through live television broadcasts, an online platform, and mobile applications, enabling customers to conveniently shop from the comfort of their homes or on the go. QVC's mission is to inspire customers with innovative products and exceptional service, while its vision emphasizes the creation of a personalized shopping experience that fosters customer loyalty and community.  The target market for QVC Germany encompasses a diverse demographic, appealing to consumers ranging from fashion enthusiasts to home improvement aficionados who value quality and convenience. To enhance its product offerings, QVC collaborates with renowned brands and designers, providing exclusive deals and unique items that cater to the evolving preferences of its clientele. With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, QVC Germany continuously adapts its product selection and services to meet the changing needs of its shoppers. By focusing on exceptional value and convenience, QVC aims to build a community of loyal customers who appreciate quality and innovation in their shopping experiences.

Name: MR.DIY Poland
Company description: MR.DIY Poland is a prominent home improvement retailer, part of the larger MR.DIY Group, which operates over 1,400 stores across Malaysia and Brunei. The company offers an extensive range of approximately 17,000 products across various categories, including hardware, household items, electrical goods, stationery, and sports equipment, all at affordable prices. With a mission to provide quality products at "ALWAYS LOW PRICES," MR.DIY aims to cater to the everyday needs of its customers, making home improvement accessible to everyone. The company also engages in community initiatives, such as partnerships with local brands and participation in promotional events, to enhance customer experience and support local economies. Targeting a diverse clientele, MR.DIY serves both individual consumers and businesses, ensuring a wide reach in the retail market.

Name: MR DIY Spain

MR DIY collaborates with top global manufacturers to ensure that its offerings meet the highest industry standards. Name: Castorama Polska Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: Castorama Polska Sp. z o.o. is a leading retail chain in Poland, specializing in the sale of building materials and accessories for DIY enthusiasts. Headquartered in Warsaw, the company offers a comprehensive range of products and services for home renovation, construction, and gardening, catering to both individual customers and professional contractors. Castorama's mission is to empower customers to create their ideal living spaces by providing quality products at competitive prices, complemented by exceptional customer service. The company is committed to promoting sustainability by offering eco-friendly products and renewable energy solutions, aligning with its ambitious ESG goals, which include reducing CO₂ emissions and increasing the share of sustainable products in its sales.  Castorama engages in responsible business practices and strives to be a market leader by delivering innovative solutions and maintaining high standards of customer satisfaction. Its clientele includes homeowners, DIY enthusiasts, and professionals in the construction industry, reflecting a diverse target market. By focusing on customer needs and sustainability, Castorama aims to be the go-to destination for home improvement in Poland, fostering a community of creativity and responsible living.

Name: Brico Depôt Iberia

Name: Praxis

The company offers an extensive range of items, including bathroom furniture, kitchen supplies, and garden accessories, aimed at empowering customers to create their ideal living spaces. Praxis's mission is to provide accessible and affordable solutions that enable individuals to undertake their DIY projects with confidence. The company's vision is centered on enhancing the DIY experience through expert advice and high-quality products. Catering to a diverse clientele that includes homeowners, renters, and DIY enthusiasts, Praxis collaborates with various partners to ensure a comprehensive selection of tools and materials. As part of the Maxeda DIY Group, the largest DIY retailer in the Benelux, Praxis serves both private customers and professional tradespeople. The company is committed to customer satisfaction, offering services such as professional installation, personalized product advice, and tool rental, which further solidifies its position as a go-to destination for all home improvement needs. With a strong focus on sustainability, Praxis aims to support the makers of today and tomorrow, providing not only products but also the knowledge and resources necessary for successful DIY projects. The company operates numerous stores across the Netherlands and is expanding its online platform, ensuring that customers have access to its offerings wherever they are. Through its dedication to quality, service, and customer empowerment, Praxis Doe-Het-Zelf Center B.V. continues to inspire creativity and satisfaction in home improvement endeavors.

Name: Boels Rental

Our employees have a can-do attitude. Boels thrives on the entrepreneurial spirit of our employees who see themselves as service providers, furthermore as partners to our customers. It’s no surprise that an extremely high number of colleagues feel engaged in the company. At Boels Rental, our moto is “anything is possible and we’ll make it happen”.  Our full range of products, branches and specialties can be found at www.boels.com

Name: BAUHAUS & Co KB

Name: Karwei
Company description: Karwei is a leading Dutch home improvement retailer dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of products and services tailored for DIY enthusiasts and homeowners. The company specializes in home renovation and gardening projects, offering everything from stylish furniture and home decor to essential tools and materials. Karwei is committed to sustainability, featuring eco-friendly product lines such as Fairf, which includes plant-based wall paints and lacquers that are water-based and free from harmful solvents. The company's mission is to inspire and support customers in creating their ideal living spaces while minimizing environmental impact, aligning with their vision of promoting greener choices in home decor. Karwei's target market encompasses homeowners, renters, and DIY enthusiasts who seek quality materials, tools, and inspiration for their projects. The retailer also caters to professional contractors looking for reliable supplies. To enhance customer experience, Karwei offers a convenient rental service for tools and equipment, allowing customers to access specialized devices without the burden of high purchase costs. Collaborating with well-known brands like vtwonen and WOOOD, Karwei provides exclusive collections of flooring, furniture, and home accessories that cater to diverse styles and preferences. In addition to its extensive product offerings, Karwei fosters a community of engaged customers through its Club Karwei loyalty program, which provides exclusive discounts and promotions. With a strong emphasis on customer service, Karwei ensures that every customer can find the right products for their home improvement projects, making the process accessible and enjoyable. Overall, Karwei stands out as a prominent player in the Dutch home improvement market, dedicated to quality, design, and sustainability.

Name: TECNOMAT
Company description: TECNOMAT is a prominent Italian company specializing in the design and manufacturing of high-quality outdoor cooking equipment, particularly barbecues and grills. With a strong commitment to innovation and excellence, TECNOMAT aims to enhance outdoor culinary experiences by providing durable, efficient, and stylish products that meet the needs of both amateur and professional chefs. The company serves a diverse clientele, including individual consumers, restaurants, and catering businesses, focusing on those who appreciate premium outdoor cooking solutions. TECNOMAT collaborates with various partners in the construction and home improvement sectors to ensure the highest standards of quality and safety in its offerings. The company's mission is to create products that not only deliver exceptional performance but also promote safe and enjoyable cooking practices in outdoor settings. TECNOMAT emphasizes the importance of adhering to strict technical standards and safety regulations, ensuring that its products meet the highest quality benchmarks. The target market includes outdoor cooking enthusiasts, culinary professionals, and businesses in the hospitality sector, all of whom seek reliable and stylish cooking solutions. In addition to its focus on product quality, TECNOMAT is dedicated to sustainability and customer satisfaction, continuously striving to improve its offerings and maintain its reputation as a leader in the outdoor cooking equipment industry. By prioritizing craftsmanship and functionality, TECNOMAT envisions becoming a trusted name in outdoor cooking across multiple markets, enhancing the overall user experience while adhering to local and European regulations. Through its commitment to safety, innovation, and environmental responsibility, TECNOMAT aims to lead the industry in providing efficient and reliable outdoor cooking solutions.

Name: BHG Finland
Company description: BHG Finland is a leading player in the Nordic consumer e-commerce landscape, operating under the umbrella of BHG Group AB, one of Europe's largest online retailers. The company specializes in three primary business units: Home Improvement, Value Home, and Premium Living, offering an extensive selection of approximately 1.7 million products, including DIY supplies, furniture, and home furnishings. BHG Finland's mission is to simplify the lives of its customers, encapsulated in its vision, "We make living easy!" This commitment drives the company to provide a comprehensive product portfolio at competitive prices, ensuring exceptional online customer experiences and professional services. With a strong online presence, BHG serves a diverse clientele across the Nordic region, including individual consumers and businesses, while also expanding its reach into European and Asian markets. The company operates over 100 online platforms, featuring well-known brands like Bygghemma and Nordic Nest, and collaborates with reputable external brands such as Bosch and Husqvarna to enhance its offerings. BHG Finland is dedicated to sustainability and operational efficiency, focusing on ethical supply chains and high standards of product safety and quality. The company's strategic vision emphasizes profitable growth through organic expansion and strategic acquisitions, with a net sales target of SEK 20 billion in the medium term. BHG Finland aims to strengthen its leadership position in the premium segment of the home furnishings industry while adapting to changing consumer behaviors and market conditions. By continuously seeking to streamline operations and consolidate its market presence, BHG is well-positioned for long-term growth and success in the evolving e-commerce landscape.

Name: Einhell Germany AG
HQ Location: Germany, Bavaria, Landau An Der Isar, 22 Wiesenweg, 94405
Company description: Einhell Germany AG, with over 40 subsidiaries worldwide, has been one of the leading suppliers in the Do-It-Yourself sector for more than 55 years, developing and selling solutions for DIY enthusiasts and hobby gardeners for use in the home, workshop and garden. The company, based in Landau an der Isar in Lower Bavaria, is now active in more than 90 countries. The product range includes hand-held power tools, stationary tools and accessories, as well as products in the field of garden and lawn care, and irrigation and drainage technology. Einhell places particular focus on the further development of its cordless product range in the form of the Power X-Change battery system, which already includes over 250 cordless tools and gardening equipment. The battery platform will even be expanded to 450 tools by 2027 and is already considered the broadest system for the ambitious do-it-yourselfer and hobby gardener on the market.

Name: Rusta Finland Oy
Company description: Rusta Finland Oy is a leading retail company in the Nordic low-price market, specializing in a diverse range of home and garden products. Operating under the Rusta brand, the company focuses on providing high-quality items at competitive prices, making home improvement accessible to a broad audience. Rusta's mission is to enable customers to "renew and replenish their homes at surprisingly low prices," while its vision emphasizes becoming the leading and most trusted low-price retailer in Europe. The company serves a wide array of clients, including individual consumers, families, and DIY enthusiasts, primarily through its network of over 200 physical stores and an online sales platform in Finland and other Nordic countries. Rusta's product assortment includes home decoration, consumables, seasonal products, leisure items, and DIY supplies, ensuring a constantly updated selection that meets the evolving needs of its customers. The company is committed to sustainability, integrating eco-friendly practices into its operations and striving for climate neutrality by 2030 for direct emissions and by 2045 for all emissions. Rusta collaborates with various suppliers and partners who adhere to strict environmental and social standards, ensuring responsible sourcing and high product quality. Additionally, Rusta has developed a strong customer loyalty program, Club Rusta, which has seen significant growth and engagement. The company aligns its operations with the UN's Sustainable Development Goals and the UN Global Compact's principles, focusing on environmental responsibility, human rights, and anti-corruption. With a strategic vision for sustainable growth and operational efficiency, Rusta Finland Oy aims to expand its market presence while enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty through innovative and affordable product offerings.

Name: Rusta
Company description: Rusta AB is a leading retail company based in Upplands Väsby, Sweden, specializing in a diverse range of home improvement and leisure products. Founded in 1986, Rusta operates over 220 stores across Sweden, Norway, Finland, and Germany, alongside a growing online sales platform, Rusta Online. The company's mission is to provide high-quality products at competitive prices, making home enhancement accessible to everyone while ensuring a positive shopping experience. Rusta emphasizes sustainability as a core aspect of its operations, aiming to integrate responsible practices throughout its supply chain and product offerings. With a workforce of more than 4,800 employees, Rusta serves a broad customer base, including individual consumers, families, and DIY enthusiasts. The company has successfully attracted a growing membership base for its loyalty program, Club Rusta, which boasts over 5.6 million members. Rusta's product range includes home decoration, consumables, seasonal items, and DIY supplies, catering primarily to budget-conscious consumers seeking value for money. Rusta is committed to sustainability, with ambitious goals to achieve climate neutrality by 2030 for its direct operations and by 2045 for its entire value chain. The company collaborates with various suppliers to ensure ethical sourcing and compliance with environmental standards, reflecting its dedication to reducing its environmental impact. Rusta's vision is to become the most trusted low-price retailer in Europe, focusing on sustainable growth and improved profitability through strategic initiatives and expansion. As a publicly traded company on Nasdaq Stockholm, Rusta demonstrates its commitment to transparency and growth in the retail sector. With a focus on enhancing the quality of life for its customers, Rusta continues to adapt its product offerings to market trends while maintaining a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction and operational excellence.

Name: Clas Ohlson
Company description: Clas Ohlson AB is a leading Swedish retail company founded in 1918, specializing in home improvement, DIY, and consumer goods. The company aims to simplify everyday life for its customers by providing a wide range of practical and sustainable solutions at attractive prices. Clas Ohlson offers an extensive assortment of products, including tools, hardware, electrical items, multimedia, and home improvement supplies, available through both physical stores and a robust online platform across Sweden, Norway, and Finland. With a mission to make home fixing accessible, sustainable, and enjoyable for everyone, Clas Ohlson emphasizes sustainability by promoting durable products and offering spare parts to extend the life of items. The company serves a diverse clientele, including DIY enthusiasts, homeowners, and professionals, and has a strong customer base with approximately 5.4 million members in its loyalty program, Club Clas, which enhances customer engagement and satisfaction. Clas Ohlson is committed to responsible growth and aims to achieve a fully circular and climate-neutral business model by 2045, reflecting its dedication to environmental stewardship. The company collaborates with various partners to ensure compliance with ethical sourcing and labor standards, positioning itself as a trusted brand in the retail market. Through continuous innovation and a focus on customer needs, Clas Ohlson strives to maintain its position as a first-choice destination for home fixing solutions. The company also emphasizes corporate governance and risk management, ensuring transparency and accountability while navigating the dynamic retail environment. With a strong emphasis on inclusivity and employee well-being, Clas Ohlson fosters a positive workplace culture that supports growth and development for its co-workers. Overall, Clas Ohlson is dedicated to enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency while promoting environmentally friendly practices throughout its supply chain.

Name: ITAB Group
Company description: ITAB Group is a leading provider of innovative retail solutions, dedicated to transforming consumer brand experiences into physical realities through cutting-edge design and technology. Company description: Chadwicks Group is Ireland's leading builders' merchanting company, operating with over 50 stores and over 1,400 colleagues across the country.  Thanks to our unrivalled knowledge and expertise in the construction sector, we have been part of the fabric of everyday life in Ireland for over 200 years, providing building materials to homes, hotels, farms, transport networks and every other form of business throughout the country. In the early days the firm owned three horses and carts, but as business increased they added a fourth horse and cart and employed another driver! In the '50s the business expaned, moving to bigger premises in Walkinstown and adding new lines such as fire clay to its range of building products. Further expansion took place in the '60s and in 1967 the company opened its first branch outside Dublin, in Kilkenny. Today, Chadwicks is Ireland's leading Builders Merchants and Home Improvement Specialist, offering customers a huge range of timber, building materials and home improvement supplies including plumbing and heating products. Chadwicks Group currently operates Chadwicks, Heiton Steel, The Panelling Centre, Telfords, Cork Builders Providers, Proline, Sitetech, Morgans Timber, HSS Hire Ireland and Davies builders' and plumbers' merchanting businesses in the Republic of Ireland.

Name: Act4Eco
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Hvidovre, Arnold Nielsens Boulevard
Company description: Act4Eco is an action oriented platform, that helps EU consumers increase awareness of their energy consumption and improving their energy efficiency. ACT4ECO engages energy consumers interactively either with e-learning tools or a transformative group learning approach. As a tool for both educational purposes and community-building, the platform will motivate energy consumers to explore various solutions in terms of home improvements and implementation of energy-saving best practices.  By following the proposed learning paths, users will go from motivation to exploration and finally to action. The adoption of ACT4ECO approach will allow reaching the overall objectives of the project, namely: - Reducing energy costs - Monitoring energy efficiency actions  - Increasing awareness and consciousness of efficiency control Act4Eco is part of ECO2 (Energy Conscious Consumers), an Horizon2020 funded project. Sharing knowledge in a community, either physical or online, ECO2 aims at developing a set of information for users to establish a dialogue with policy-makers and innovators at European level, to contribute in defining future lines of action.

Name: Praktis Bulgaria DIY
Company description: Praktis е верига строителни хипермаркети, посветена на това да предложи всичко необходимо за строителство, ремонт и обзавеждане, за да улесни живота на професионалисти и любители, които искат най-доброто за своето пространство. Компанията бързо и целенасочено се развива в сегмента “направи си сам” (DIY – Do It Yourself) и е член на European DIY Retail Assosiation/Global Home Improvement Network - EDRA/GHIN . Praktis е история на мечти, амбиции и неуморна работа, която се разгръща в продължение на 22 години. От самото си начало, ние сме се ангажирали да бъдем не просто доставчик на строителни и интериорни решения, а истински партньор в реализирането на проекти за дома и градината. Вярваме, че всеки дом е отражение на индивидуалността на неговите обитатели и нашата роля е да помогнем на тези мечти да станат реалност. С течение на времето, ние сме се утвърдили като важен участник на пазара, стремейки се да предложим не само качествени продукти, но и иновации, които променят начина, по който хората взаимодействат с пространствата около тях. Нашата цел не е просто да продаваме стоки, а да помагаме на нашите клиенти да създадат уютни и функционални пространства, където могат да прекарат незабравими моменти. Поставяме акцент на детайлите, защото знаем, че те правят разликата между обикновеното и изключителното. Днес веригата строителни хипермаркети е представена в 7 български града – София, Пловдив, Велико Търново, Русе, Хасково, Стара Загора, Видин в които има 8 физически магазина и предлага над 50 000 артикула за дома, градината и строителството. Нашият асортимент от разнообразни продукти съчетава достъпност и високи стандарти, осигурявайки на нашите клиенти, решение, което е едновременно практично и естетично, за да им помогнем да реализират своите идеи с лекота и увереност. Ние вярваме, че качеството не е лукс, а необходимост, която всеки заслужава. Ние сме дълбоко ангажирани с корпоративната и социалната отговорност, които считаме за важен аспект от нашата работа.
